Name: Instructor's Cap
Title: Pre-Prepared: Instructor's Cap
Desc: "I don't have the talent to command an army as its general, nor am I qualified for anything beyond being a soldier."\n"All I can do is to be a strict instructor to these children, so that they might survive on the battlefield a bit longer."

Talent.Name: Instructor's Cap
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character triggers an Elemental Reaction:</color> Create 1 Elemental Die that matches this Character's Elemental Type. (Max 3 times per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
